report.title: Extremely High Dose of Kavalactones
report.author: Am Duirmott
report.bodytext: I take 6mg of clonazepam daily, so the 15mg dose I took this morning was kid's stuff. I decided to purchase a bottle of kava extract (40% kavalactones, app. 2000mg kavalactones per bottle). I tried 800mg kavalactones and, pleased with the mild anxiolytic, euphoric, and very strong muscle relaxant effects that were brought on after about 30 minutes, I decided to down the rest of the bottle. /n /n T=0:10 /n Anxiolytic effects more pronounced; euphoria and muscle relaxation still moderately strong, but not changed since the 800mg kavalactone dose. /n /n T=0:20 /n Feeling VERY sociable (a wonderful feeling for a social phobic such as myself); euphoria much stronger; muscle relaxation has practically turned my legs to jello. No cognitive dulling of any sort. /n /n T=0:30 /n Effects continuing from 10 minutes ago, though exponentially stronger. I feel as if I could take on the world, if I could just make my muscles work properly, lol! /n /n T=0:45 /n Just one thing to say--how can this stuff be legal???!!!! /n /n T=1:00 /n Not much change from the 30 minute mark, aside from some pronounced OEV's, CEV's, and an almost LSD-like distortion in spacial perceptions. /n /n T=5:00 /n The effects haven't subsided in the least in the past four hours, and I hope they never do! /n /n ~Anxiety level (1-10) -- 0; very disinhibited, in fact. /n ~Muscle relaxation (1-10) -- 10; and this is saying something, considering that not even Flexeril, Soma, Elavil, or Zanaflex have helped with my fibromyalgia. /n ~Pain relief (1-10) -- 10; I had a moderate headache before taking this, as well as the constant muscle-aches I deal with day to day. All eradicated. /n ~Hypnotic effect (1-10) -- 1; I don't feel sleepy in the least. In fact, I feel mildly stimulated. /n ~Aphrodisiac effect (1-10) -- 10!!! Jerking off was quite an experience, lol. /n /n T=8:00 /n Still feeling the effects strongly, though the hallucinations have subsided just recently. /n /n T=12:00 /n Most effects subsided, except for moderate muscle relaxation, anxiolysis, and pain relief. /n /n T=15:00 /n Back to baseline.
